data.title: Karen Elson & Jack White Divorce: Pair Splits, Throws A Party
data.meta_description: Karen Elson & Jack White Divorce, Throw A Party
data.text: "We remain dear and trusted friends and co-parents to our wonderful children Scarlett and Henry Lee. We feel so fortunate for the time we have shared and the time we will continue to spend both separately and together watching our children grow. In honor of that time shared, we are throwing a divorce party. An evening together in Nashville to re-affirm our friendship and celebrate the past and future with close friends and family."
